column3: Since this breaks translations and the readability gain is questionable, I'd suggest to close this pull request.
Closing for now. Let me know if someone disagrees.
Not sure if the changes are worth it. Is this even picked up as a translation that way?
Is your concern with the adjacent string literals? That should not affect translation. Or am I missing something?\n\n
> Not sure if the changes are worth it. Is this even picked up as a translation that way?\n\nOnly stuff physically inside the `_()` will be picked up by gettext. Never pass variables to it.
